name: Ventro
description: Ventro is a modern theme with a clean design. It is full-width, allowing you to use large hero images to express your value proposition or highlight your latest product. The homepage also has space for three categories, with a focus on imagery for visual appeal. The product pages continue with the modern layout with product images on the left, a description on the right, and then a section below for further details or product specifications.
author: LemonStand <support@lemonstand.com> (http://docs.lemonstand.com)
